article_title: What Marketing Can Do For Hospitals

article_metadata.author: On Marketing

og.description: This article is by Punam Anand Keller, the Charles Henry Jones Third Century Professor of Management at the Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth. Remember when you first consulted Expedia or TripAdvisor to read reviews on hotels? It probably drastically changed the way you shopped for a place to stay. Now hospitals are facing the same [...]
